name: Assistant of detective Zbyšek (CZ)
description:
(Game in Czech Only)

Detective Zbyšek Claus is a brave dolphin who protects the cute city of Regenbogen from crime. You are the best student in the detective school and Zbyšek himself will teach you how to be a good detective. On the day of your admission, a young unicorn is murdered. Show your best in the investigation of this difficult case. A team of great forensics detectives is going to help you. But be careful. Evil is hidden in unexpected places

CREDITS:

Graphics: Ondřej "Syky" Sýkora

Concept art - Neko Logická: Lucie “Ruchie” Duháčková

Concept art - Akakuro: Mashiro

Programming: Emil “Moti” Gašparec

Music: FLOW MC

Betatest: Lucie “Ruchie” Duháčková, Jozef “Dagi” Duháček, Petr “Guzmicz” Hamza

Proofreading: Lucie “Ruchie” Duháčková, Veronika Bobková

------------------------------------

Original Release date: 19.1.2012

Time of gameplay: 90 minutes

Number of words: 34 513

Number of choices: 105

Number of ends: 12
